ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Seeking advice
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/00 5:47:12 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Welcome and umm you know I am pulling my hair out to come up with a jewel of wisdom and I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/00 5:47:12 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
sobrien@... writes:

> Secondly I just wondering if you had one piece of advice for a young
> necro what would it be ?


Welcome and umm you know I am pulling my hair out to come up with a jewel of
wisdom and I cant. I also have played many classes, 45 druid is the highest
and I have had a blast with my two primary secondarys enchanter and necro.

One thing that I did find frustrating was all the "necros are gods"
information I was reading. I tried to be that god and died more often than
not until I learned my way. A really nice site is eqnecro.com
